DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare nighttime symptom relief fluticasone furoate nasal spray oral fexofenadine
DOC.brief_title: Fluticasone Furoate Nasal Spray Versus Oral Fexofenadine
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Informed consent . Outpatient . Females childbearing potential must use appropriate contraception . Diagnosis seasonal allergic rhinitis mountain cedar . Adequate exposure allergen . Able comply study procedure . Literate . Exclusion criterion : Significant concomitant medical condition . Use corticosteroid , allergy medication , medication affect allergic rhinitis Positive pregnancy test . Allergy component investigational product . Tobacco use Contact lens use Has chickenpox measles recent exposure Other clinical trial drug exposure last 30 day Affiliation clinic site
